title: Ticket #7779: Address code review comments for condor_nsenter
description:
Address code review comments for "Ticket #7666: condor_ssh_to_job should fully work with singularity"

2020-Jul-27 22:59:18 by jfrey:
Code Review

  • Eliminate duplicate call to findChildProc() in os_proc.cpp.

  • Eliminate redundant calls to getenv().

  • Can't we end up with two DISPLAY environment variables in envp? Can we trust that the first one in the list will win?

  • Shouldn't we not call ioctl(TIOCSWINSZ) if ioctl(TIOCGWINSZ) fails?

  • Blindly trusting that the grandchild pid will have all of the correct environment variables and other properties seems error prone when it can be a child of the original job process.
